Description: Lower body and flat base sherd of Chian pottery bowl; white slip; interior reserved with two lines fired red-brown; exterior reserved.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the slip and decoration, see Boardman (1967, 162-3, no. 769) and Boston 88.938. Boardman, J., Excavations in Chios 1952-1955. Greek Emporio. Annual of the British School at Athens Supplement 6. Oxford 1967.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2042) (phase 2)
